feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 54B20
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 14, 05:30 - 07:00 UTC

Oct 24, 23:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 14/11/2024 05:30 UTC
End time : 14/11/2024 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack 54B20 will be unreachable during the maintenance
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack 54B20 to rack 54B22

Thank you for your understanding.
